items.sentence: I was surprised when Tom told me he didn\'t need to do that.
I was surprised when Tom told me he didn\'t want to do that.
Tom didn\'t want to help and Mary couldn\'t persuade him to.
Tom looked out the window and saw Mary playing with her dog.
Tom put all his belongings in boxes and sent them to Boston.
It\'s about time we brought this party to an end, isn\'t it?
I thought you might like to know who\'s coming to our party.
I can think of more interesting places to visit than Boston.
I have a feeling I\'m going to really like living in Boston.
I love to see people\'s reactions when I tell them who I am.
I think Tom said he\'d be staying in Boston for three weeks.
Tom isn\'t the kind of man who would say that kind of thing.
Tom leaned forward and whispered something into Mary\'s ear.
Did you really think I was the one who painted this picture?
I asked Tom why he wasn\'t planning to go to Boston with us.
Tom said he wouldn\'t be able to do what we asked him to do.
Tom didn\'t doubt that there would be a lot of people there.
I think it\'s time for you to start helping out around here.
I think we\'ll all feel better once we get something to eat.
I think you\'re having a better time than you want to admit.
